Package xyz.jeremynoesen.pseudo3d.scene

Class Scene

java.lang.Object
xyz.jeremynoesen.pseudo3d.scene.Scene
public class Scene
extends java.lang.Object
scene to place entities, a camera, and code injections to modify them

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Scene()
    create a new scene
    Scene​(java.util.LinkedList<Entity> entities, Camera camera, Sprite background, Vector gridScale)
    create a new scene with pre-defined entities, camera, and background color
    Scene​(Scene scene)
    copy constructor for scene

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Scene addEntity​(Entity entity)
    add an entity to this scene
    Scene addRenderRunnables​(java.lang.Runnable runnable)
    add a runnable to the render loop for this scene
    Scene addTickRunnable​(java.lang.Runnable runnable)
    add a runnable to the tick loop for this scene
    void clearDeltaTime()
    reset the last values for ticking and rendering.
    boolean equals​(java.lang.Object o)
    check if a scene is identical to this scene

    get the background sprite for the scene

    get the scene grid scale

    get the speed of the scene

    get all tick runnables for the scene

    remove an entity from this scene

    remove a runnable from the tick loop for the scene
    void render​(javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext graphicsContext)
    render this scene to the main canvas, as well as run any render injections
    Scene setBackground​(Sprite background)
    set a sprite to show when the scene is rendered
    Scene setCamera​(Camera camera)
    give this scene a different camera
    Scene setGridScale​(Vector gridScale)
    set a new grid scale for the scene
    Scene setSpeed​(float speed)
    set the speed modifier for the scene
    void tick()
    tick all entities in the scene, updating all motion first, and then all collisions take place.

  • Constructor Details

    • Scene

      public Scene()
      create a new scene

    • Scene

      public Scene​(java.util.LinkedList<Entity> entities, Camera camera, Sprite background, Vector gridScale)
      create a new scene with pre-defined entities, camera, and background color
      Parameters:
      entities - entities in scene
      camera - scene camera
      background - background sprite
      gridScale - scene grid scale

    • Scene

      public Scene​(Scene scene)
      copy constructor for scene
      Parameters:
      scene - scene to copy

  • Method Details

    • tick

      public void tick()
      tick all entities in the scene, updating all motion first, and then all collisions take place. also run any tick injections

    • render

      public void render​(javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext graphicsContext)
      render this scene to the main canvas, as well as run any render injections
      Parameters:
      graphicsContext - graphics context to render to

    • clearDeltaTime

      public void clearDeltaTime()
      reset the last values for ticking and rendering. should only be called if the game loop is paused

    • getEntities

      public java.util.LinkedList<Entity> getEntities()
      get all the entities in this scene. modifying this directly will cause problems
      Returns:
      list of all entities in this scene

    • addEntity

      public Scene addEntity​(Entity entity)
      add an entity to this scene
      Parameters:
      entity - entity to add

    • removeEntity

      public Scene removeEntity​(Entity entity)
      remove an entity from this scene
      Parameters:
      entity - entity to remove

    • getCamera

      public Camera getCamera()
      get the camera for this scene
      Returns:
      scene's camera

    • setCamera

      public Scene setCamera​(Camera camera)
      give this scene a different camera
      Parameters:
      camera - new camera

    • getBackground

      public Sprite getBackground()
      get the background sprite for the scene
      Returns:
      background sprite of scene

    • setBackground

      public Scene setBackground​(Sprite background)
      set a sprite to show when the scene is rendered
      Parameters:
      background - sprite to set as background

    • addTickRunnable
